Articles.Content:
Hello!. I have been casually playing ksp since .16 and havent really accoplished any huge achivements. I dont have my own computer to play for hours and hours. The forum is a great place. The moding section is amazing. I am getting my own computer next month. That means ksp for days. want to make a youtube series of a ksp career. if you guys could help me pick out some mods, screen recording softwares, and some ideas for the career plot, that would be great.

Thanks a lot,

Collin Cutler

KSP for days? You are sorely mistaken.

Don't be surprised if you look up and it's three months from when you started...

Welcome aboard!

Oh, you didn't discover timewarp yet?

Welcome!

BD armory just had an update for dogfights.

A tiny suggestion: you might want to ask a mod to change your username to something more... anonymous.

Oh, you didn't discover timewarp yet? update for dogfights.

A tiny suggestion: you might want to ask a mod to change your username to something more... anonymous.

Thanks for the idea. I accadentally put my email in the username box... I have been looking for a long time how to change my username. Does anyone know a way that I can change my username?
I can do that but it does change your login name, what do you want your name to be?
Thanks a lot! Can you change my username to cutlercollin99? Do you need any other things from me? I really appreciate it!
Changing your name now, just remember to login with cutlercollin99
